While submerged beneath an enemy, the user launches themselves out of the ground to launch an attack.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja 4]]'', Kakashi uses this technique in conjunction with his summoned [[ninken]], who [[Summoning: Earth Release: Tracking Fang Technique|restrain]] the opponent beforehand.
* Before learning Earth Release, [[Naruto Uzumaki]] was able to mimic the nature of this technique to defeat [[Neji Hyūga]] in the [[Chūnin Exams]] by burrowing through the ground, albeit his fingers bled from the action.
